form.title: Pay your application fee and pre-pay your residency taxes
form.applicationFee: Your application fee amounts to 50.00 euros. They will be charged regardless of the outcome of your application.
form.residencyTaxes: Your residency taxes amount to 77.00 euros. They will not be debited in case of a favorable decision
form.residencyTaxes.renouvellement: Your residency taxes amount to 49.00 euros. They will not be debited in case of a favorable decision
